compound.name: src/modems
compound.brief: Contains the source code for all loggerModem subclasses.

files.name: DigiXBee.cpp
files.brief: Implements the DigiXBee class.

files.name: DigiXBee.h
files.brief: Contains the DigiXBee modem subclass of loggerModem, which itself is a parent class for all other XBee's and XBee3's.

files.name: DigiXBee3GBypass.cpp
files.brief: Implements the DigiXBee3GBypass class.

files.name: DigiXBee3GBypass.h
files.brief: Contains the DigiXBee3GBypass subclass of the DigiXBee class for Digi Cellular XBee's based on u-blox SARA U201 chips and operated in bypass mode.

files.name: DigiXBeeCellularTransparent.cpp
files.brief: Implements the DigiXBeeCellularTransparent class.

files.name: DigiXBeeCellularTransparent.h
files.brief: Contains the DigiXBeeCellularTransparent class for Digi Cellular XBee's operating in transparent mode.

files.name: DigiXBeeLTEBypass.cpp
files.brief: Implements the DigiXBeeLTEBypass class.

files.name: DigiXBeeLTEBypass.h
files.brief: Contains the DigiXBeeLTEBypass subclass of the DigiXBee class for Digi Cellular XBee3's based on u-blox SARA R410M chips and operated in bypass mode.

files.name: DigiXBeeWifi.cpp
files.brief: Implements the DigiXBeeWifi class.

files.name: DigiXBeeWifi.h
files.brief: Contains the DigiXBeeWifi subclass of the DigiXBee class for Digi S6B Wifi XBee's.

files.name: Espressif.cpp
files.brief: Implements the Espressif class.

files.name: Espressif.h
files.brief: Contains the Espressif subclass of loggerModem which is a parent class for the ESP8266, the original ESP32, and the various ESP32 flavors.

files.name: EspressifESP32.cpp
files.brief: Implements the EspressifESP32 class.

files.name: EspressifESP32.h
files.brief: Contains the EspressifESP32 subclass of loggerModem which SHOULD work for essentially any breakout or variant of the ESP32 wifi/bluetooth chip that has been flashed with Espressif's AT command firmware.

files.name: EspressifESP8266.cpp
files.brief: Implements the EspressifESP8266 class.

files.name: EspressifESP8266.h
files.brief: Contains the EspressifESP8266 subclass of loggerModem which SHOULD work for essentially any breakout of the Espressif ESP8266 wifi chip that has been flashed with Espressif's AT command firmware.

files.name: LoggerModemMacros.h
files.brief: Contains PRE-PROCESSOR MACROS for use with logger modems.

files.name: QuectelBG96.cpp
files.brief: Implements the QuectelBG96 class.

files.name: QuectelBG96.h
files.brief: Contains the QuectelBG96 subclass of loggerModem for Dragino, Nimbelink, or any other module based on the Quectel BG96.

files.name: SequansMonarch.cpp
files.brief: Implements the SequansMonarch class.

files.name: SequansMonarch.h
files.brief: Contains the SequansMonarch subclass of loggerModem for Nimbelink or other modules based on the Sequans Monarch VZM20Q.

files.name: SIMComSIM7000.cpp
files.brief: Implements the SIMComSIM7000 class.

files.name: SIMComSIM7000.h
files.brief: Contains the SIMComSIM7000 subclass of loggerModem for Botletics other modules based on the SIMCOM SIM7000.

files.name: SIMComSIM7080.cpp
files.brief: Implements the SIMComSIM7080 class.

files.name: SIMComSIM7080.h
files.brief: Contains the SIMComSIM7080 subclass of loggerModem for Botletics other modules based on the SIMCOM SIM7080.

files.name: SIMComSIM800.cpp
files.brief: Implements the SIMComSIM800 class.

files.name: SIMComSIM800.h
files.brief: Contains the SIMComSIM800 subclass of loggerModem for Adafruit Fona 2G, the Sodaq GPRSBeeR4 and almost any other module based on the SIMCOM SIM800 or SIM900 modules and their variants.

files.name: Sodaq2GBeeR6.cpp
files.brief: Implements the Sodaq2GBeeR6 class.

files.name: Sodaq2GBeeR6.h
files.brief: Contains the Sodaq2GBeeR6 subclass of the SIMComSIM800 class and is specific to the Sodaq 2GBee revisions 6 and higher based on the SIMCOM SIM800h.

files.name: SodaqUBeeR410M.cpp
files.brief: Implements the SodaqUBeeR410M class.

files.name: SodaqUBeeR410M.h
files.brief: Contains the SodaqUBeeR410M subclass of loggerModem for the Sodaq UBee based on the u-blox SARA R410M LTE-M cellular module.

files.name: SodaqUBeeU201.cpp
files.brief: Implements the SodaqUBeeU201 class.

files.name: SodaqUBeeU201.h
files.brief: Contains the SodaqUBeeU201 subclass of loggerModem for the Sodaq UBee based on the u-blox SARA U201 3G cellular module.
